title: How to install Android 13 on Google Pixel and other Android devices
content:
Android 13 is currently available as a beta release. The flashaholics will be delighted to know that Google has already made the system images available for download. You can give it a shot right now if you’ve got the right hardware, but there aren’t as many supported devices this time around. All you’ve got to

The post How to install Android 13 on Google Pixel and other Android devices appeared first on XDA.
description: Google has just released Android 13 Beta 1 for eligible Pixel devices. Here is how to install Android 13 on your smartphone.
